content.p1: The small missile is the next step up from the #microMissile in the list. This missile is 2 blocks tall or about double the size of the #microMissile. With the increase in size the #payload can extended to 5 #explosives.
content.p2: Crafting is a bit more complex then standard #minecraft recipes and requires a specialized #workstation.
content.p3: In order to craft the missile first make a #missileCasing then place it into the #workstation. After this insert the #rocketEngine, #guidanceChip, and #warhead. Once all of these are inserted then you can finish off the recipe and receive a #missile. See each #workstation for exact steps on usage.
